How do you feel about using the Mousiki app ? Happy Mixed feelings Not happy
So, you\'re pretty happy with Mousiki.\n\nWould you mind taking 1 minute to rate the app? We would love you forever if you give us 5 stars! How can we make you happy? We would love to know how we can improve your experience. Later Your comments‚Ä¶ Thank you for your feedback!.\nYour message has been sent to our support team.

Send Your feedback‚Ä¶ Give us feedback about a Mousiki feature? Let us know how we can improve your Mousiki experience.
The Power Saving Mode needs the permission "modify system settings" to reduce the screen brightness. Please enable it on settings. To meet YouTube Terms of Service, Mousiki cannot play music video in background. You can turn on the power saving mode to lock your screen. Slide to unlock
